searchPage.title: Let's 探します
searchPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter text and press comma, Enter, or '、'

generationPage.description: Generate topics based on your proficiency and selected content. The text will be saved in the Reading section of the selected lesson.
generationPage.anonymousDisclaimer: Make it Anonymous (Other users won't know who created this.)

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: - Be specific. Give context of what you want.
tips.tip2: - If the decks are too big, not all elements will be used.
tips.tip3: - The model prioritizes the selected Decks.
tips.tip4: - Consider your level. If you scale up the JLPT level, advanced Words and Kanji will appear in the text.

landingPage.title: Manabu Mori
landingPage.heroTitle:
Learn one language
Use one app
landingPage.heroDescription:
An all-in-one Japanese learning platform for Students and Teachers.
Dictionaries, flashcards, AI-powered exercises, resources and everything you need.
landingPage.footerText: ©2024 Manabu Mori - Optimizing learning - 学習を最適化する
landingPage.objectiveDescription: Our objective is to offer an all-in-one study solution that centralizes all the needs of students and teachers for learning Japanese. We’ve created an easy-to-use, fast, and accessible platform from any device, eliminating the need to rely on multiple applications.
landingPage.studentToolsDescription: Centralized tools for every student to improve their Japanese with artificial intelligence. Discover features like flashcards, AI corrections, a kanji dictionary, and grammar tests, all in one place.

missionSection.missionDescription: Our mission is to help students and teachers simplify Japanese learning and, in the future, expand to other languages, connecting cultures and people around the world.

teacherFeaturesSection.title: For Teachers
teacherFeaturesSection.description: Advanced tools to centrally and effectively manage your classes, students, and content.
teacherFeaturesSection.featureDescription1: Organize and monitor your classes in one place.
teacherFeaturesSection.featureDescription2: Easily manage schedules and important dates.
teacherFeaturesSection.featureDescription3: Share materials and resources with your students.
teacherFeaturesSection.featureDescription4: Create exclusive content assisted by AI for your students.
teacherFeaturesSection.featureDescription5: Manage students, track progress, and organize groups.

roadmapSection.title: Roadmap
roadmapSection.description: Our development plan to provide an increasingly complete experience.
roadmapSection.target1desc: Complete platform launch with all features.
roadmapSection.target2desc: Support for AI-assisted study content generation.
roadmapSection.target3desc: Add gamification elements like points and achievements to motivate learning.
roadmapSection.target4desc: Special features for teachers to manage their classes and students.
roadmapSection.target5desc: Integration of AI for written text correction.
roadmapSection.target6desc: Implementation of flashcard decks for vocabulary and kanji.
roadmapSection.target7desc: Launch of the beta version of the platform for a limited group of users.
